00020 #ifndef NETWORK_NETTYPES
00021 #define NETWORK_NETTYPES
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 namespace Network {
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 enum NetProtocol { NETPROTOCOL_ANY = 0, NETPROTOCOL_UNKNOWN = NETPROTOCOL_ANY,
00030     TCP_IP = 1, UDP_IP = 2, USAR_WC = 3 };
00031     
00032 enum ConnectionStatus { NOT_CONNECTED = 0, CONNECTED = 1, 
00033     TRYING = 2, FAILED = 3, CONNECTION_RESET = 4 };
00034 
00035 string netProtocolToString(NetProtocol netProtocol);
00036 NetProtocol stringToNetProtocol(const string& s);
00037 
00038 string connectionStatusToString(ConnectionStatus status);
00039 ConnectionStatus stringToConnectionStatus(const string& s);
